title: React Retreat
description: A fictional luxury hotel website where users can register and make reservations, and administrators can manage bookings and users.
tools: MongoDB / Mongoose / Express.js / React / Redux / Node.js / JSON Web Tokens / JavaScript/jQuery / Stripe.

title: Week In View
description: An app to plan your week and beyond. A calendar, to-do list, and weather dashboard.
tools: MySQL/Sequelize / Express.js / Express Sessions / Passport / JavaScript/jQuery / Handlebars.

title: Cook Something Good
description: An app to search for and save recipes to local storage with a customizable shopping list.

title: MVC Tech Blog
description: A blog application for multiple users built with an MVC framework.

title: Employee Tracker
description: A command line interface (CLI) application that allows a user to manage a simple employee database.
tools: JavaScript / Node / MySQL / npm inquirer package.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: A scheduling app, allowing a user to plan their day, storing events in local storage.
tools: JavaScript / jQuery / AJAX / Web APIs / HTML / CSS.
